page.title: 12A YOUNG VIEW OF COPFORD
page.content:
{ Copford's}all right - there are lots of things to do - if you join clubs. Older people seem to have a lot of activities to do. There are not many places to go and relax especially for the young. It would be nice to have a decent playingfield. It is easy to get to larger places for shopping or entertainment.{Bus {services and the trains}are good and we are not far away from the sea. There is only one{shop}which is a small{general stores.}You would think in a place like Copford there would be more. I expect when I leave school I will have to find a job in Colchester.It's a good place to live.
Written by a 12 yr.old Copford resident.
